instruction: Preheat grill to medium-high heat (about 400 degrees Fahrenheit).
Clean portobello mushrooms and remove stems.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Brush mushroom caps generously with the marinade.
Place mushrooms gill-side down on the preheated grill.
Grill for about 10 minutes, or until tender and slightly charred.
Flip mushrooms and grill for an additional 5 minutes, or until cooked through.
Remove from grill and serve immediately.
